list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She deposited her shopping basket in the kitchen.

list_definition.definition: to put in for safe keeping

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He deposited the money in the bank.

list_definition.mean_english: khoản tiền gửi vào tài khoản
list_definition.definition: an act of putting money in a bank etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She made several large deposits at the bank during that month.

list_definition.definition: an act of paying money as a guarantee that money which is or will be owed will be paid

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We have put down a deposit on a house in the country.

list_definition.definition: the money put into a bank or paid as a guarantee in this way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We decided we could not afford to go on holiday and managed to get back the deposit which we had paid.

list_definition.mean_english: lớp chất đọng lại do một chất lỏng
list_definition.definition: a quantity of solid matter that has settled at the bottom of a liquid, or is left behind by a liquid

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The floodwater left a yellow deposit over everything.

list_definition.definition: a layer (of coal, iron etc) occurring naturally in rock
